LocationPicker.geolocationNotSupported: sisan navigatɔrɔ tɛ geolocation sɔrɔli dɛmɛ .
LocationPicker.getLocationFailed: A ma se ka yɔrɔ sɔrɔ, i ka permisw lajɛ .
LocationPicker.getCurrentLocation: Aw bɛ yɔrɔ min sɔrɔ sisan, o sɔrɔ .
LocationPicker.title: Yɔrɔ tɔgɔ .
LocationPicker.descriptionPlaceholder: Aw ye ɲɛfɔli dafalen sɛbɛn (a bɛ se ka kɛ) .
LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: An ka kan ka i ka yɔrɔ kunnafoniw sɔrɔ walasa ka baara ɲumanw kɛ, yala o bɛ se ka kɛ wa?
LocationPicker.permissionDenied: Jyɔrɔ sɔrɔli yamaruya bɛ ban, i ka jɔyɔrɔ sɔrɔli yamaruya di i ka navigatɔrɔw ma .
LocationPicker.locationTimeout: positioning time out, aw ye aw jija ka minɛn in da wuli ani ka a ɲini ka segin ka sɔrɔ .
LocationPicker.locationUnavailable: Yɔrɔ min bɛ yen sisan, o tɛ se ka sɔrɔ, i ka minɛnw sigiyɔrɔ baarakɛyɔrɔ lajɛ .
